group_1.textLeft: ...They'll be better off this way, really.

group_1.textRight: That's not gonna work.
We haven't even told them about Kamihama.
Shouldn't we at least tell them about the product@exhibition?
Yeah, yeah!
Even if they say no, we'll just have to convince them!

group_1.textLeft: But...

group_1.textRight: We've come this far. Why stop now?

group_1.textCenter: And my, what a surprise—@Shizuka and Chiharu are here, too!

group_1.textLeft: Sorry for the intrusion!

group_1.textRight: Long time no see.

group_1.textLeft: I'm home...
Mrs. Toki, we wanted to—

group_1.textRight: You're a little late.

group_1.textLeft: Huh?

group_1.textRight: Oh, don't worry, I didn't mean you, I meant Sunao.

group_1.textLeft: Huh...

group_1.textRight: You said you'd be coming home early, didn't you,@Sunao?

group_1.textLeft: ...I'm sorry.

group_1.textRight: There's no need to apologize.@I was just worried about you.
Now tell me what happened.

group_1.textLeft: Well, I had to stop by the village...

group_1.textRight: The village?@Why didn't you tell me about that?

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, I forgot to bring it up...

group_1.textRight: I already told you, Sunao, there's no need to@apologize.
Now can you please tell me what's going on?

group_1.textLeft: Actually...

group_1.textRight: A product exhibition, then...

group_1.textLeft: If this works out, we can save the village!
So can Sunao come along with us, then?

group_1.textRight: You'll be going to the town without a chaperone?

group_1.textLeft: Well, yes...

group_1.textRight: So...there won't be any adults with you, then.

group_1.textLeft: Charu's mom got in touch with the supermarket...

group_1.textRight: That's not the only problem.
They can't have middle schoolers working part-time.
You're the only ones who can carry the products@into town, right?
I can't believe they'd have you working all day,@carrying heavy loads...

group_1.textLeft: But it's not a part-time job.@We'd just be helping them.

group_1.textRight: You'd be traveling there on foot, wouldn't you?@You'd come home very late...
And what about safety? Is the area around the@supermarket safe?

group_1.textLeft: Well, that's...

group_1.textRight: Uh, um...

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, but you two need to leave for today.
Don't worry, I'll discuss this with my parents and@convince them.
Y-yeah.

group_1.textRight: We need to talk about this with your father, too...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I understand!
Alright, I'll see you two tomorrow!
Y-yes!

group_1.textRight: See you tomorrow, then, Sunao!

group_1.textLeft: ...Hey, Charu.

group_1.textRight: What is it?

group_1.textLeft: Sunao's mother is really something, huh...

group_1.textRight: She's so worried about Sunao...

group_1.textLeft: I'm starting to get why Sunao hasn't told her about@going to Kamihama...

group_1.textRight: Yeah…

group_1.textLeft: (Have Sunao's parents always been like that@with her,)
(or did something happen to make them@that way...?)

group_1.textCenter: I was just worried about my mom and dad...
